movie.title: Death Smiles on a Murderer
movie.description_intro: A young woman, Greta, loses her memory following an accident with a carriage and finds hospitality at the villa of two wealthy landowners Eva and Walter von Ravensbruck. The two welcome the girl with great hospitality--far too much--and she ends up in bed with the husband first, and then with the wife. Even Dr. Sturges, who pays her first visit, is interested in her and, above all, he is interested in the amulet that she wears around her neck. In fact, he is carrying out mysterious experiments to bring the dead back to life through ancient formulas attributed to the Incas and that amulet is very familiar to him. Things get complicated when Eva discovers Greta's affair with her husband and, in a raptus of jealousy, Eva kills her by entombing her alive. But a month later, during a masquerade party, Greta mysteriously reappears with a decayed face and begins to persecute Eva, pushing her to suicide - and the deaths will not end here.
movie.description_full: A young woman, Greta, loses her memory following an accident with a carriage and finds hospitality at the villa of two wealthy landowners Eva and Walter von Ravensbruck. The two welcome the girl with great hospitality--far too much--and she ends up in bed with the husband first, and then with the wife. Even Dr. Sturges, who pays her first visit, is interested in her and, above all, he is interested in the amulet that she wears around her neck. In fact, he is carrying out mysterious experiments to bring the dead back to life through ancient formulas attributed to the Incas and that amulet is very familiar to him. Things get complicated when Eva discovers Greta's affair with her husband and, in a raptus of jealousy, Eva kills her by entombing her alive. But a month later, during a masquerade party, Greta mysteriously reappears with a decayed face and begins to persecute Eva, pushing her to suicide - and the deaths will not end here.

movies.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
movies.summary: In this retelling of Rick Riordans book, "The Sea of Monsters", Percy Jackson, accompanied by his friends Annabeth Chase, Clarisse La Rue and Tyson, his half brother, goes on a journey to the Sea of Monsters to retrieve the Golden Fleece and save Camp Half-Blood.
movies.description_full: In this retelling of Rick Riordans book, "The Sea of Monsters", Percy Jackson, accompanied by his friends Annabeth Chase, Clarisse La Rue and Tyson, his half brother, goes on a journey to the Sea of Monsters to retrieve the Golden Fleece and save Camp Half-Blood.

movies.title: Gloves Off
movies.summary: This is the story of Doug, a fantastic fighter but not so fantastic businessman, who must save his beloved gym by training a gentle giant for a bare-knuckle fight.
movies.description_full: This is the story of Doug, a fantastic fighter but not so fantastic businessman, who must save his beloved gym by training a gentle giant for a bare-knuckle fight.
movies.synopsis: This is the story of Doug, a fantastic fighter but not so fantastic businessman, who must save his beloved gym by training a gentle giant for a bare-knuckle fight.

movies.title: Deepsea Challenge
movies.summary: DEEPSEA CHALLENGE 3D follows the dramatic story of James Cameron's odyssey as he undertakes an expedition to the deepest part of the ocean. This is a journey of historic proportion and risk. The film will mesmerize viewers of all ages with the thrill of true discovery and the allure of the unknown, of new life forms, and of vistas never before captured on camera - all right here on planet Earth.

movies.title: After Midnight
movies.summary: When an exotic dancer is murdered at a seedy strip club, her sister goes undercover to find the killer. While working at the club, she realizes that everyone is a suspect and she must work fast to find the killer and get revenge.
